title: What are some reflections about understanding philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: evidently, most people want religion without a god, so the enlightenment invented ‘philosophy’ and rebranded god as ‘reason’. the actual philosophic is just a method with no content. god doesn’t picture in because there’s nothing which could be that god of religion. if an all encompassing single direction as ‘god’ exists then it wouldn’t change anything at at all. we’d still know only what’s what and do only what we can do.
Eventually the strangeness of philosophy will strike you. And that may be off-putting. So maybe you shouldn’t even start down that twisted road.
